title: Easiest ADC's for Solo Q
body: I suck at ADC and I need some champs that are easy to do well with and have self peel

replies.body:
Caitlyn
Graves
Sivir

Shoutout to Ezreal, but he doesn't perform well in this meta.

Yeah I've been doing a bit of Ez but he does like no damage lmao. I seem to do ok when I play Sivir but when she's gone, I need someone else. I'm not a huge fan of Graves just coz of how much he falls off and he isn't fantastic in this meta, Caitlyn I could work with. Trist?

Graves most certainly doesn't fall off.

No ADC "falls off" technically, some just excel FAR better than others for whatever weaknesses they may have (cough Miss Fortune)

The problem with Ez is he tends to spike rather hard at around the 10-20 minute mark (Manamune completion) and then has no real way to actually do more damage.

And yes i'm aware he CAN do more damage, it's just from that mark his hit his main spike, and every other ADC has more then 1 main spike (in fact most of them have several)

The problem with Caitlyn is that the only thing she has going for her, is her range, now sure this makes her "easier" however because you have no real way to win other then out ranging, she tends to be one that doesn't actually do much for someone who doesn't understand how to ADC very well (and probably isn't suited)

Depends on what you need
Trist: Strong with good tower pushing
Jinx: Strong with long range and AoE auto's but less self peel
Ashe: Strong against no gap closers (rare but you know)
Draven: Strong at snowballing if you can work on catching axes.
Yeah I might pick up a bit of Trist again. Just good for self peel.

Draven is also good for this if you can learn the simple catch your Axe's mechanic, the main problem trist has is no real Mid game spike compared to most other ADC's (sure she has the Infinity Edge, but she scales off it about the same as every other ADC.), whereas draven can spike even off a BT first item.

Depends on how good you are at continuing to do mechanics while in a team fight, if you can keep the mechanics running then go Draven, if not then Trist is definitely the champ to go.
Watching me play AD is like watching a pig try to backflip...  lmao My fightinf mechanics with ads are just reeeealllyy bad

Then Trist is definitely the one to go to, she has a lot of leniency for fuck ups thanks to her ult and W combination, the main thing to remember is that she does struggle early game unless your Opponents are willing to take an E and several auto's (but enough do that so it's ok.)

Lucian, Graves, Sivir and Ez are like the only 4 that can self peel and easy to play ATM BUT they have their downsides.

Lucian can't deal with fed mids or tanks so pray very hard that solo lanes and jungle don't get ruined then you just might carry the game.

Graves can't kill tanks unless you do like a botrk + double PD build which means no defensive item so you'll get blown up instantly unless you've got some serious positioning and mechanics.

Sivir you need your teammates to end the game while the enemy has 3 people follow you around for eternity.

Ez can go tear build but if your team gets trashed on pre 20 then you've the lost game because you won't do any damage. You could always go tri > botrk > greaves > PD > LW/IE > IE/LW and be a hyper carry that can q auto(tri proc + crit) to 1 shot carries but once again unless you've got skills you ain't gon pull dis off.
